column4: Cases Pending Trial from the Previous Year (Col. 4)
column5: Cases Sent for Trial During the Year (Col. 5)
column6: No. of Cases Withdrawn by the Govt. (Col. 6)
column7: No. of Cases Disposed by Plea Bargaining (Col. 7)
column8: Total no. of Cases for Trial During the Year (Col. 8) = (Col.4+5-6-7)
column10: Cases in Which Trials were Completed (Col. 10) = (Col. 11+12)
column13: Cases Pending Trial at the End of the Year (Col. 13) = (Col.8 - (Col.9+10)
